parameters.name: Ids
parameters.description: The IDs of the affected assets.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The method to handle the risk item. Valid values:

*   **ignored**: ignores the risk item.
*   **failed**: cancels ignoring the risk item.

parameters.name: TaskId
parameters.description: The ID of the check task to which the affected assets belong.
